description: Conversion of loft space involving a dormer extension at rear and rooflights to front roofslope.
decision_conditions: Planning permission is required for the conversion of loft space involving the erection of a dormer extension at the rear and installation of rooflights to the front roofslope. Condition 10 of planning permission ref: N1993/37540 which allowed the 'Demolition of existing building and erection of ten 2-bedroomed and two 3-bedroomed terraced houses together with covered parking bays, parking spaces and access road.' has removed Permitted Development Rights in respect of development falling within Classes A - H of Schedule 2, Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
